 <span style="font-size:120%;font-weight:bold">Services</span>
 &nbsp;
 
 </div>
 
 <div id="wikicontent">
 <div class="vt" id="wikimaincol">
 <p>Retrieve the list of social media services, groups and contacts belonging to the authenticated user. </p><h4><a name="URL:"></a>URL:<a href="#URL:" class="section_anchor"></a></h4><p><a href="http://login.newsocialcloud.com/api/v1/services.format?type=type" rel="nofollow">http://login.newsocialcloud.com/api/v1/services.format?type=type</a> </p><h4><a name="Formats:"></a>Formats:<a href="#Formats:" class="section_anchor"></a></h4><p>Replace <tt>format</tt> with either <tt>xml</tt> or <tt>json</tt> </p><h4><a name="HTTP_Methods:"></a>HTTP Methods:<a href="#HTTP_Methods:" class="section_anchor"></a></h4><p>GET </p><h4><a name="Parameters:"></a>Parameters:<a href="#Parameters:" class="section_anchor"></a></h4><ul><li><tt>application_id</tt>: Your application id from <a href="http://newsocialcloud.com/developers" rel="nofollow">http://newsocialcloud.com/developers</a>. </li><li><tt>type</tt>: Possible values are <tt>all</tt>, <tt>social</tt>, <tt>email</tt>, <tt>sms</tt>, <tt>group</tt>, <tt>contacts</tt> </li><li><tt>filter</tt>: Optional. Filter services and/or recipients by keyword. </li><li><tt>per_page</tt>: Optional. Number of results to return per page. Default: <tt>100</tt> </li><li><tt>page</tt>: Optional. The page number to return. Default: <tt>1</tt> </li></ul><h4><a name="Authentication:"></a>Authentication:<a href="#Authentication:" class="section_anchor"></a></h4><p>Basic authentication with username and password or remote API key belonging to the newsocialcloud user. </p><h4><a name="Success_Response:"></a>Success Response:<a href="#Success_Response:" class="section_anchor"></a></h4><pre class="prettyprint"><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<user-services type="array">
  <user-service>
    <account-name>Facebook note - newsocialcloudWeb</account-name>
    <account-type>Facebook(note)</account-type>
    <icon-url>http://newsocialcloud.com/imagenes/facebook.png</icon-url>
    <recipient-id>6304</recipient-id>
    <total-pages type="integer">4</total-pages>
  </user-service>
  <user-service>
    <account-name>Facebook page - Amazon</account-name>
    <account-type>Facebook(page)</account-type>
    <icon-url>http://newsocialcloud.com/imagenes/facebook.png</icon-url>
    <recipient-id>6296</recipient-id>
    <total-pages type="integer">4</total-pages>
  </user-service>
  <user-service>
    <account-name>Facebook page - newsocialcloud</account-name>
    <account-type>Facebook(page)</account-type>
    <icon-url>http://newsocialcloud.com/imagenes/facebook.png</icon-url>
    <recipient-id>6289</recipient-id>
    <total-pages type="integer">4</total-pages>
  </user-service>
</user-services></pre><h4><a name="Error_Response:"></a>Error Response:<a href="#Error_Response:" class="section_anchor"></a></h4><pre class="prettyprint"><error>
<type>InvalidUsernamePassword</type>
<message>Username/password is invalid.</message>
</error></pre><p>OR </p><pre class="prettyprint"><error>
<type>ServicesNotFound</type>
<message>No services could be found.</message>
</error></pre>
